name: Card Combat
description:
Card Combat is a strategy card game with a fabled medieval theme where you play against a honestly kinda clonky AI.

The Game is still in the Beta and has allot of Bugs in it. Please be informed that I am currently working on fixing those.

The King our Majesty, has lost all control. The five Factions compete for the  throne in a terrifying Civil War.
But will you be the one to forge an alliance strong enough to unite the Kingdom once more?
